markdownRemark.html:
disclaimer: this article exists for educational purposes and because i believe in the open sharing of knowledge and information üíï

here‚Äôs how i would maybe go about it

go to https://rentry.co/fwt (courtesy of /fwt/)

scroll down to downloading windows links, and click:

‚Äú10 SAC Consumer from Microsoft (lags behind MSDN refreshes): ISO‚Äù - or just click this link if it works

for type, select ‚ÄùWindows (Final)‚Äù

for version, select the top windows 10 version (or the one with the highest build number)

pick a language

select the file that ends in _x64.iso

save ‚ú®

go back to https://rentry.co/fwt and scroll down to recommended activators

find kms_vl_all, click on the pastebin thread

visit one of the listed urls, and download the file

the password is written in the pastebin (it‚Äôs the current year)

you can now install windows 10

when the installation is over, run kms_vl_all and follow the instructions

then, go to this pc, system properties and click ‚Äòchange product key‚Äô

use the following key, found here:

NPPR9-FWDCX-D2C8J-H872K-2YT43

run kms_vl_all again üßö‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

you‚Äôre finished!
